import React from 'react' import {FaListAlt, FaCheckSquare, FaPlusSquare, FaTrash} from 'react-icons/fa' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' const NavBar = ({onDeleteCompleted}) => (
< FaCheckSquare />
) export default NavBar
